name: Kampong Battle
description:
Kampong Battle is an Action-RPG single player game where a player micro-manages four characters, each with their own roles, to help them through fights. Encounter unique bosses along the way, such as the feisty Baa-Baa and the stinky Sia-Laffre.

-Face off against progressively stronger baddies and unique bosses.
-Adopt various fighting strategies to win fights in Kampong Battle.
-Collect and upgrade powerful armor and equipment to help you on your journey.
-Learn 'Talents' to enhance your abilities to suit the situation.
-Challenge your friends on the Kampong Battle leaderboard and unlock achievements along the way.
-Take on *LIMITED TIME* event bosses such as the mysterious Dong Dong Qiang, who only appears during the Lunar New Year period.
